# Maintainer notes

The distribution contains these files

 * `vmdplumed.tcl`. The main gui. 
 * `templates_list_vmdcv.tcl`. List of templates for the "colvar" builtin interface. Manually generated. Untested
 * `templates_list_v1.tcl`. List of templates for PLUMED 1. Manually generated. Likely obsolete.
 * `templates_list_v2.tcl`. List of templates for PLUMED 2. Autogenerated. 
 * `pkgIndex.tcl` Autogenerated. See note 2.


## Bumping version

Use

    uv tool install bump-my-version
    # commit any pending changes
    bump-my-version bump minor -v



## Autogenerated files


### List of templates for PLUMED 2

This is generated by the `maintainer/templates_list_v2_generator.tcl` generator, which invokes `plumed driver` (which
must be in the path). 

	tclsh maintainer/templates_list_v2_generator.tcl > templates_list_v2.tcl


### Package index

It is an important part of TCL's packaging scheme. The file should be updated as part of the bumping process. 
Basically amounts to

    pkg_mkIndex -verbose .



## Cross-compiling plumed2

Possibly outdated

```
# ./configure --host=i686-w64-mingw32   --disable-shared LDFLAGS=-static

# Linking all molfiles (useless) ---------
# Extract catdcd-5.1.tar.gz
# make -k win32
# olist=`( cd Obj_win32 ; echo *.o |sed 's/\.o//g')`
# bash config/create_static_header.sh MOLFILE molfile include/libmolfile_plugin.h $olist
# ar rcs libmolfile_plugin.a Obj_win32/*.o
# i686-w64-mingw32-ranlib libmolfile_plugin.a
#
# In plumed
# ./configure --host=i686-w64-mingw32 --disable-shared LDFLAGS="-static -L/tmp/catdcd-5.1" CPPFLAGS=-I/tmp/catdcd-5.1/include
```
